scripts.deploy:dev: gcloud functions deploy mc_calendar-dev --entry-point update --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast2 --memory 512MB --timeout 360
scripts.deploy:prod: gcloud functions deploy mc_calendar --entry-point update --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast2 --memory 512MB --timeout 360
